  • java.lang.Object

    PosBlockIndexInput

    protected class PosBlockIndexInput.PosBlockReader
extends BlockIndexInput.BlockReader
    Implementation of the BlockReader for the .pos file.

    Read and decode blocks containing the the term positions.
